title: What are some myths that it’s shameful to believe in? - Quora

response.answer_text: That men are inherently superior to women. That Trickle Down Economics works and is based on evidence. That Donald J Trump is anointed by God to be the President of the United States. That Single Payer Healthcare systems conflict with a conservative philosophy. That poor people are less deserving than rich people. That the USA is blessed by God and deserves to be exceptional. That Donal Trump can make America Great.
That people are inherantly good and you should respect and trust them…..and the same for government, politicians and media.
